name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.description: Studying the motion of air around an object.

lessons.description: Theoretical treatment; Experimental study and/or measurement technology.

lessons.name: Aircraft Design
lessons.description: Estimation of weights, performance, structural loads, aerodynamics, controls, and propulsion.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic flow
lessons.description: Subsonic flow is when speed is less than the speed of sound.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Supersonic flow is when speed is the same or greater than the speed of sound.

lessons.name: Mach numbers
lessons.description: The ratio of flow velocity after a certain limit of the sound's speed.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Kinetic Energy
lessons.description: Conversion of kinetic energy into heat.

lessons.name: Relative Motion
lessons.description: Relative motion between a body and a fluid.

lessons.name: Hypersonic Aircraft
lessons.description: Hypersonic flight is flight through the atmosphere below altitudes of about 90 km at speeds greater than Mach 5.
